full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MA GCIG MKHA' 'GRO'I SNYAN BRGYUD KYI LAM ZAB RGYUN GYI RNAL 'BYOR 'KHYER BDE BAR BKOD PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @028A *, ,(CES MA CIG MKHA' 'GRO'I SNYAN BRGYUD KYI LAM ZAB @028B RGYUN GYI RNAL 'BYOR SHIN TU 'KHYER BDE BAR BKOD PA 'DI NI YONGS 'DZIN DAM PA BYAMS PA 'PHRIN LAS DAR RGYAS KYI ZHABS RDUL SPYI BOR LEN SH'AKYA'I DGE SLON CHOS MED SNYOMS LAS CAN BYAMS PA LHA DBANG RIG 'DZIN GYIS RANG NYID KHA 'DON DU BYAS PA'I CHED DU SHIN TU MYUR BAR SBYAR BA'O, ,)
